title: The Root of all Trouble (A Nina Quinn Mystery #7)  - Heather Web
description:
When a spring storm rolls through Freedom, Ohio, landscape designer Nina Quinn expects to get her hands dirty with the mess left behind.

But after high winds uproot a tree, revealing the corpse of a man inside its rotted hollow, Nina quickly realizes that cleaning up after Mother NatureÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fury is the least of her worries.

It soon becomes clear that there is no lack of suspects in the manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s untimely death. As a shady contractor and philanderer, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d angered a lot of people before he disappeared, including some of NinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s closest friends.

With the help of her police detective ex-husband, a mysterious coronerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s investigator, her formerly-felonious employees and her zany neighbors, Nina sets out to uncover a killer...before another victim ends up planted six feet under.
